statements: DELETE FROM risk_factors WHERE driver_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' AND factor_name='Distraction';
DELETE FROM driver_behavior_data WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND acceleration > 5.0;
DELETE FROM driving_logs WHERE log_id = 100 AND driver_id = 3;
DELETE FROM trips WHERE duration_minutes > 60 AND distance < 10;
DELETE FROM vehicles WHERE make = 'Ford' AND year < 2010
DELETE FROM incident_data WHERE incident_type = 'Speeding' AND severity > 5;
DELETE FROM driver_data WHERE speed > speed_limit AND driver_name LIKE '%John%';
